lines: 1. Yesu Imfumu mu Betelemu, 'Fyalilwe mwi cinka ngo mupina;
Awe mwandi! Cali ca kupapa, Kwisa fwaya ine.
2. Yesu Mupusushi pa lupanda, Andubwile no mulopa wakwe;
Awe mwandi! Cali ca kupapa, Ukufwila ine.
3. Yesu Mupusushi umo wine. Na lilya naile ciyeyeye:
4. Yes' akesa kufuma ku mulu, Bulayo busuma kuli ifwe;
Nkamumona â€˜lefuma ku mulu, Akeshila ine.
